channel.title: A bunch of problems tht i can't fix
channel.description: my first question is that how can i make a command list that pops out... my secound question is that how do i make a command that either sells everything in the inventory or banks them... my third question is that how can i make my characters open door cause i can't.. and i can't take things from table (I'm coding allstar-scape v2 if tht helps)....... plz help my lol i'm a noob at this stuff

item.title: A bunch of problems tht i can't fix
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

put the long one under a another void.

and to open doors, you should use the replaceobject method, or if theres a file called doors.cfg, add it to there.

Read full topic

search for it, and add it under it.

item.title: A bunch of problems tht i can't fix
item.dc:creator: @link132343 link132343
item.description:
@link132343 wrote:

[quote=“Telenim, post:2, topic:326189”]public void Commands() { clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Close Window", 1137); sendQuest("", 1139); sendQuest("", 1140); sendQuest("", 1141); sendQuest("", 1142); sendQuest("", 1143); sendQuest("", 1144); sendQuest("", 1145); sendQuest("", 1146); sendQuest("", 1147); sendQuest("", 1148); sendQuest("", 1149); sendQuest("", 1150); showInterface(1136); flushOutStream(); }

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("Commands") { Commands(); }[/quote]

where do i add these?
